page.title: 06EVENTS-1
page.content: Mr Paul Drayton is the chairmain of Sandown{CARNIVAL}Committee. He has worked at the carnival for nine years. The main carnival is at the end of July and is the biggest{EVENT}of the year. It lasts for 1 hour. The illuminations are at the end of August. The day before the carnival is the childrens fancy dress parade. Last year we collected Â£400 from the parade. To make a float we work for three months. We could spend a whole week doing it instead. We have had Sandown Carnival for 35 years. There are about 30 floats. It costs about Â£250 to decorate floats with flowers, lighting and decoration. We crown a carnival queen and we have a Mr Universe competition and a grandmother competition. Last year we had a {BARBEQUE}with a steel band on the beach.
